Series two of Celebrity Gogglebox started on Channel 4 last night (Friday, June 5), but one of the stars was missing. It turns out that Laurence Fox won't be on this series at all.

articles.title: St Helens silent protest on Black Lives Matter movement a success - St Helens Star
articles.description: TODAY, at noon, residents came together to stand in Victoria Square to support the #BlackLivesMatter movement.
articles.content:
